The home of Glenn Weatherson

Intro

I'm a web developer living in Reno, Nevada. During the day I work at 970 Design. Most of my career has been building websites from the ground up using Wordpress. That said, recently I've been taking quite a liking to Astro and am open to other tooling. I find joy in the process of turning a new design into a coded, usable experience, especially when there are new things to try along the way.

Some of the most notable client work I've been a part of include GoPro, Nike, Tahiti, Yosemite, Pokemon, and more.

Available for side projects

Interests

  • Mountain biking, and bicycles in general.

  • Video games like CS2 and R.E.P.O.
  • Trying not to die.
  • Finding new music.
  • Snowboarding.
  • Getting rid of things.
